pullrequest.title: Unicode strings and other Python 3 forward-compatible changes.

content.raw:
Pandas moves pretty quickly. If I get a pull request in with them it's entirely possible a fix would be in the conda repositories within a few weeks, and we could simply have this pull request include a requirement for a newer version of pandas. Or we could continue to allow old pandas whilst having my fix monkey-patched on. I would prefer that than having random bytestrings here and there conditional on Python 2.

I'll see what the fix for pandas looks like and we can take it from there.
